description: Slack is a messaging platform for teams to communicate and collaborate.
name: slack
title: Slack

actions.description: Sends a message to a public channel, private channel, or existing direct message conversation.
actions.name: sendMessage

properties.description: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to.
properties.name: channel
properties.label: Channel

actions.title: Send message

actions.description: Sends a direct message to another user in a workspace. If it hasn't already, a direct message conversation will be created.
actions.name: sendDirectMessage

properties.description: User to send the direct message to.
properties.name: channel
properties.label: User

actions.title: Send Direct Message

triggers.description: Triggers when a new message is posted to a channel.
triggers.name: newMessage
triggers.title: New Message
